rComments: I had him in 04/05.  I found him to be a fair marker despite what others have said below.  He is a bit 'all over the place', but I enjoyed his classes.  He was a very nice dude.  He reminds me of a balding, post-Nirvana Krist Novoselic.  He's now in Sydney according to his webpage

Anyone who says he is an unfair marker obviously are just bitter abut their bad marks.  Prof Ivison is an awesome teacher who is SO passionate about the material, plus he is a really nice guy!  The TA's Nader and Serder were also REALLY helpful but that doesn't take away from what a great Prof Ivison was.
Great prof IMHO, the class average tended to be high and the course itself was very interesting... Serdar as a TA was more helpful though.
Great Prof! Given that he is a hard marker, he presents a set of complex material in an excellent way. has the class involved and gets things done ON TIME. Very helpful. But it IS a HARD COURSE!

His lectures aren't that helpful b/c he doesn't really go through all the material.  Just make sure to attend the last/review class.  He ends giving you the exam questions. Stick to the tutorials and online summary notes.  TA Nader Hashemi will save you in this course!!!
He is horrible. He is all over the place, makes very little sence, really hard marker, talks about things (other philosphers) not studied in the course. he is just horrible!!!!

He's nice to talk to, but his lectures are terribly boring maybe b/c of his accent and the fact that he provides far too much historical context. He is a hard marker, but he provides sample exam questions which really end up being the exam! Use the net, it'll save you and get on the TA's good side.

Unfair marker, or rather, says that you've done an excellent job, compliments you on your work and then gives a mark that does not in anyway reflect his comments. TA wasn't that great either. Reading and the internet got me through this class. Atleast he gives you hints towards the exams

A very, very unfair marker.  Ivison is also a terrible lecturer- goes round and round in circles and contradicts himself all the time.  Kudos to the TA Nader Hashemi- without him we would have all been screwed.  HE SHOULD REPLACE IVISON!!!!!!
